title: Drone Ambulance and Medical Systems
description: A prototype drone-based medical system designed to reduce emergency response time using GPS and IoT for real-time patient monitoring.

title: Obstacle Avoiding Robot
description: An autonomous robot designed to navigate environments by detecting and avoiding obstacles using ultrasonic sensor and IR sensor, with real-time path correction and movement control managed by an Arduino-based system.

title: Military Fire Sentry Gun Prototype
description: A surveillance system with motion detection and automatic targeting using servo motors and PIR sensors for restricted zone security equiped with a gripper to detect and remove landmines.
